name: Papaya Sorbet
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, dessert, lime, papaya, simple syrup, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 medium papayas, seeded, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Puree papaya until smooth. There should be about 1 1/2 cups puree. Add the simple syrup and lime juice.
Freeze in an ice cream machine according to the manufacturer's directions.
